legal_basis: Article 482 of the Code of Civil Procedure
Section 316 of the Excise Tax Act
application_details: defendant argues certificate was served late
decision_reasoning: service was timely based on when the president became aware of the certificate
motion to revoke judgment is not applicable as the certificate is not a court judgment
result_of_case: motion to revoke judgment is refused
procedure_followed: applicability of motion to revoke judgment
